text: akan amrana ejbana lilnaas 'inzalna alwhy bialquran ealaa rajul minhum yndhrhm eiqab allh, wybshshir aladhin amanuu biallah warusulih 'ana lahum ajrana hsnana bima qddamu min salih alaemal? falamaa 'atahum rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wasalam bwhy allah wtlah elyhm, qal almnkrwn: 'inn mhmdana sahr, wama ja' bih sihr zahir albtlan
